text: 21:13 Dɨboboniba 35:10-34; Godɨn Araziba 19:1-13; Josua 20:1-9Eghtɨ a gumazir kam mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghan nɨghnɨzim ikian koghtɨ, Godra gumazir kam ateghtɨ an an agharimɨn pazɨ a damutɨma an aremegham, eghtɨ gumazir a mɨsoghezim an arɨ mangɨ nguibar kɨ ia bagha mɨsevezimɨn mangɨgh, egh a deraghvɨra ikiam.
